Package org.savarese.vserv.tcpip

Class Summary
ICMPEchoPacket ICMPEchoPacket extends ICMPPacket to implement ICMP echo request and reply packets.
ICMPPacket ICMPPacket extends IPPacket to handle ICMP packets.
IPPacket IPPacket wraps the raw bytes comprising an IPv4 packet and exposes its content via setter and getter methods.
OctetConverter OctetConverter is a utility singleton class for converting IP octets to and from other representations.
TCPPacket TCPPacket extends IPPacket to handle TCP packets.
UDPPacket UDPPacket extends IPPacket to handle UDP packets.
